[on the report of the Fifth Committee (A/73/687)]
73/281.	Shifting the management paradigm in the United Nations
Recalling its resolutions 72/266 A of 24 December 2017 and 72/266 B of 5 July 2018,
textWithHighlights: *Recalling* its resolutions 72/266 A of 24 December 2017 and 72/266 B of 5 July 2018,
